markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Captivating Curiosity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2525) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fleshwarp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=338" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can snare the attentions of onlookers with your unique appearance. You can cast [_enthrall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=104) as a 3rd-level occult innate spell once per day.
name: Captivating Curiosity
